definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: remove, displace (Ar. zaj=a push, thrust away; comp. also Aram. [[זוּחַ]], z0h., move, move away (intrans.))—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וְלאׁ יִזַּח הַחשֶׁן מֵעַל הָאֵפוֹד]] Ex 28:28 and that the breast-piece be not displaced etc., Ex 39:21 (both P).
